Reviews.Title: Fits all of my needs.
Reviews.Author: Chocolicious
Reviews.Content: I received this phone due to my scheduled upgrade with Verizon.  Since I am in a family plan I did not have to set it to pre pay and continued my regular service.  The phone works excellent for calling and texting.  The slide out keyboard is easy to use which is large deciding factor when I get a phone.There are only 2 complaints I have with this phone so far and they are minor for me.1. The pictures are of decent quality but since the screen is small they are hard to see.  It is near impossible to make out any pictures that have been sent to me by other people.2. The button locking mechanism is not very effective in my pocket.  If I bump against anything it will usually turn off and start pressing random buttons.For a basic simple phone it does not get much better than this device.

Reviews.Title: Good prepaid
Reviews.Author: Amy M. Noe
Reviews.Content: Got this for Verizon prepaid at Walmart for 40$ works great,. Reminds of phones from the 90s very simple. I use the prepaid 35$ plan since I have a house phone and since I have a tablet I don't need a fancy smart phone. Works great for unlimited texting and a few calls here and there. The camera is real clear too-

Reviews.Title: It is only for prepaid plans!
Reviews.Author: Dave Lahav
Reviews.Content: It is only for prepaid plans! For some reason Amazon "forgot" to make that clear, i was waiting for it to arrive very much, i paid for overnight shipping, when i finally got it the price went down, i can't  use it for my plan (my phone broke). meanwhile i am paying a lot of money for a daily plan on a different prepaid phone i have.

Reviews.Title: Top of the line Basic Phone
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: This Phone is Top of the line as far as PrePaid Basic Phones go.Verizon offers a few different plan types. Monthly - Daily - Minute by MinuteI went with the monthly $35 500 minutes and unlimited Text and Mobile Web. for $50 you get that plus unlimited calls (minutes).The great thing about prepaid is the you are not tied down to a costly annual contract and you have cheaper monthly options.I am a big text'r and this phone enables me to text quicker and more comfortably then other smaller keypads or touch screens (i dont really like smartphones anyways) plus the texting is unlimited so no need to keep count :)Oh an the phone i got came with $10 free Airtime Minutes as well!

Reviews.Title: Would not give as a gift to my worst enemy
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: This phone is prone to sporadically locking up on you when you are in the middle of a call or text.The web browser it has is a joke - I was unable to get on any social media site besides Facebook (sorry to buzzmarket), couldn't even got onto Google.It cannot play music, stream music, videos, or even gifs. The screen is microscopic, and the keyboard is equally small.It has mediocre battery life and no effective lock.However, it makes an alright paperweight.I am just waiting till I have enough $ to get another phone, because once I've got that, I'm gonna toss this-this joke of a phone!- as far as I can.

Reviews.Title: Beware
Reviews.Author: Kirk Sneiderman
Reviews.Content: This was a prepaid phone and could not be activated by verizon when we took it into the verizon store.

Reviews.Title: Easy and simple
Reviews.Author: Zrobster
Reviews.Content: Great replacement phone for my old reliable flip phone I sent through the washer.  All I need is to make calls and text and this works great.  Was able to keep my old Verizon pay as you go plan.....that was all I wanted!  Now with the sliding keyboard I can text with ease.  I am not a heavy cell user have the phone as a back up to my land line....and for light use.  Need to be able to text but don't need internet.  This has the ability for the net but I use the computer for that.

Reviews.Title: belongs in a landfill
Reviews.Author: D
Reviews.Content: Really awful phone (even by my standards which are used to dealing with awful phones).  This phone actually has ADS popup on the screen every 30 minutes or so and the phone itself is extremely slow (takes about 2-3 seconds to open up a text message and the keyboard on this phone is practically useless.  Avoid at all costs! it's a scam!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for young pre-teen
Reviews.Author: Diana Hutchings
Reviews.Content: I felt my 12 yr old didn't require a crazy expensive smart phone just yet, but an easy to work phone that could still text and call.This is perfect!!  I actually ended up buying two of these, as the first one lasted a week before she accidently smashed the screen in the car door.  Whoops!!  MAN am I glad I didn't start her off with an expensive gadget right off the bat.  Yet the phone is a good size for her, and easy to add minutes too, we chose to replace it!  It's been 8 months now and the phone is still going strong!  Also you can't beat verizon coverage when she is travelling between mine and her father's homes.

Reviews.Title: The phone stopped working properly about one week after use
Reviews.Author: Lisa Dellisola
Reviews.Content: Had this phone for about a week when it stopped working properly.  The phone will turn on, but appears to be off, only the two side lights light up.  Can't text or call when the phone does this.  Occasionally it will light up and work normally, but it seems to be in some sort of sleep mode most of the time.  Tried hitting all the buttons when this happens and it still does not light up and work properly.  Apparently it has some sort of defect.  Do youself a favor and don't purchase this phone....

Reviews.Title: Not worth it
Reviews.Author: Frederik Meyer
Reviews.Content: I used to have a smartphone with Verizon and decided to downgrade my phone/plan to save some $$$. Boy, was that ever a mistake. This phone just has too many quirks, let alone Verizon will absolutely KILL you with roaming charges and other hidden fees in a prepaid plan which make it not worth the time or money.Whenever you try to place a call in a "roaming" zone, the phone will prompt you to re-enter the 10 digit number, all the while sucking up minutes. Customer service was unable to explain this issue.Battery life is short for a phone of this size and capability. This is in part due to the annoying backup assistant update that pops up at 2 in the morning, which does not go away by itself, and there is no way to prevent it. WHY???My BIGGEST issue is that calls and texts sometimes get delayed or just don't go through at all. It's happened more than twice now where I call voicemail and discover a new message sitting there from a few days ago. Hmmm...Other thoughts: the design is poor - it is easy to accidentally press other buttons when sliding out the keyboard, and to hit the speaker button when pressing send. Also, the picture quality of the camera is very poor.If you're on a tight budget, there are far better phones/plans out there. I ended up switching to Net10 and the difference was night and day. Customer service may not be as great, but the rates are much more affordable. No roaming charges or other "gotcha" fees. And, more importantly, the phone actually WORKS the way it's supposed to.

Reviews.Title: Great buy for me
Reviews.Author: Vincent A. Jones
Reviews.Content: I needed replacement phones for my kids and the Cosmos is what I was looking for. They were delivered on time and they work fine. I have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Dropped Text Messages?
Reviews.Author: Elle_Navorski
Reviews.Content: I found this phone hard to navigate. It's a basic phone yet it has so many settings that, when something goes amiss, telling whether it is a settings problem or a phone defect is hard. I think it dropped some text messages and would only display parts of others. Once I spent half an hour trying to find the 'forward text message' command. Something was locked? Dunno. Text messages were inconsistently saved. The text display is in a cartoon bubble within the main display, so much space is not used. Reading text messages is difficult, even if one increases font size. As for customer service issues, what verizonpathetic.com reports is consistent with my experience. When I pressed my issues and requested a full refund, Verizon did offer a full refund within two days of my formal complaint.

Reviews.Title: Great backup phone
Reviews.Author: Mark Twain "S-L"
Reviews.Content: We will be going on a camping trip and from our previous experience only Verizon gets some sort of cell reception. Our Tmobile goes silent as soon as veer off the highway. As a backup, this phone is great for making/receiving calls on a limited basis. It is seating in my desk for the last 4 days after the first charge and the battery is almost completely full. Verizon has a pretty good $1 day/10c/minute prepaid plan.The phone is very basic, there is mSD slot, not sure what it does with it, perhaps stores photos. Call quality is very good. There is an option for mobile email but you have to pay Verizon $9/month for this to work, lame at the best.

Reviews.Title: good condition
Reviews.Author: Marc Friedman
Reviews.Content: packedwell.just accidentally bought it.didnt realize product was prepaid phone.shipped and packed well.otherwise product seemed to be in good condition.looked well

Reviews.Title: Battery defective
Reviews.Author: Suzy from Illinois
Reviews.Content: I really like the phone but am unhappy that the battery has gone after only a few months.  I have never had a battery go out before I was ready to trade in (ie 2 yrs min) I still have an LG battery in an old phone that will power the old phone up, unfortunately it will no fit this phone!!!~  LG or Amazon needs to stand behind this

Reviews.Title: Not the best
Reviews.Author: Cory Holkesvig
Reviews.Content: the phone was fine but not until i got the phone did a find out it was a prepaid phone.

Reviews.Title: Phone
Reviews.Author: kathi meyer
Reviews.Content: Love the phone.  It's an upgrade from a flip phone.  Much easier on my hands for texting.  I haven't figured out how to get internet on it yet.

Reviews.Title: Good first phone
Reviews.Author: JS
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a first phone for my son.  It is simple to use and he can call and text me easily.  And it seems to hold a charge well.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Qunbch911
Reviews.Content: i have not used this phone yet, i am hoping i can convert my cosmos II to this cosmos III but not sure i can since this one is prepaid

Reviews.Title: Hard to upload music and pictures the first time.
Reviews.Author: Dan Spencer
Reviews.Content: Good pre paid phone. I was told several times that I couldn't download music with it. I checked out several blogs about it. Finally I found a step by step on how to download music. My computer would not recognize it so I had to go to LG and download a driver. After that you have to go to settings and tools, than USB mode than mass storage. It appears on my computer as driver E. Just drag my music and pictures in driver E. let it upload.  Harder than I wanted but doable

Reviews.Title: A basic phone with lower monthly charges then two year contract with same device
Reviews.Author: Al Dulong
Reviews.Content: Not interested in 3G or 4G but wanted a basic phone. It works and has no contract and the price is lower then the same phone on a 2 year contract.

Reviews.Title: great for kids
Reviews.Author: Lana Mostafa
Reviews.Content: works as expected. hopefully it will endure my son's abusive usage.  I'm defiantly going to keep buying LG  for him

Reviews.Title: Not Bad
Reviews.Author: Tyler
Reviews.Content: Got this phone from Verizon for $75 plus tax.  would have bought it from Amazon but didn't find it when i wanted to buy.Like my title i think the phone is "not bad" if you don't want a smartphone or annual contract and also want to be in Verizon then this is the best phone they have. the price not bad either.I like that i was able to get the phone with no credit check, no contact or deposits and i can pay with any credit or debit card i want including AMEX

Reviews.Title: good sound quality
Reviews.Author: jeff parrill
Reviews.Content: was needing an newer cell phone good sound buy called overseas and could hear everything said would recommend to anyone

Reviews.Title: Pretty Good Cell
Reviews.Author: C. Taylor
Reviews.Content: PROS:Works well with a 3.5mm headset. Appearance is nice and operations through the screen are easy enough. I just wanted a simple phone and this works. I don't text or sext and don't use the internet on this device. This is talk only.CONS:Small buttons for dialing but I've seen smaller on other cells. Every cell is that way, though. It's not perfect for me but good enough for 4-stars.

Reviews.Title: It was a lie and defective
Reviews.Author: Jodi
Reviews.Content: The phone cannot be used at all because it was a used phone, and the serial number won't work with Verizon due to the last customer's negligence.  I am rather disappointed with Amazon for advertising this as a new phone when clearly it isn't.  I wasted 60 dollars and I will think twice about ordering electronics from Amazon again.

Reviews.Title: From an ex iphone user
Reviews.Author: Devilsslayground
Reviews.Content: I had to give up my iphone 4I went and bought this phone as a temporary replacement.It is the worst phone I have ever used.If you love an operating system that delays relentlessly, a slow phone, bad signal, and a worse camera - this is the phone for you. I have never used such a worthless piece of *junk*. Do not buy.

Reviews.Title: Nice basic phone
Reviews.Author: Rob Robinson
Reviews.Content: This is a basic phone but it lets you surf the web and update social networks easily.  Camera is OK but the keyboard is great.

Reviews.Title: Be careful
Reviews.Author: Laurencio Guerrero
Reviews.Content: I was very excited when I purchased this phone until I took to Verizon and was told that it could not be activated for six months because it was what is called "pre-paid".  This is a major disappointment to me because I had to pay shipping to return the phone and have no idea what Amazon will give me back for a refund since the package was opened by Verizon when they tried to activate.  Buyer be ware is all I got to say!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: love it perfect condition was still in pkg so i new it was brand new ty.It works great got covers for it wonderful ty again

Reviews.Title: Was not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Angie
Reviews.Content: I ordered this thinking I was getting a basic phone to replace my smart phone. I have a contract with Verizon. When I opened the box the first I saw was Prepay phone. I called Verizon & they said I could not activate a prepay phone with my contract. So it went back in the box & shipped back to Amazon for refund.

Reviews.Title: Misleading information!
Reviews.Author: L. Navarrette
Reviews.Content: This is only a prepaid phone! Asked for Verizon wireless compatible cell phones on Amazon site and this phone pulled up. Only it did NOT specify it only works prepaid for 6 months, then you can use on Verizon plan! Very misleading! Not like Amazon at all, and I am out the extra $3.99 I paid to express ship so my daughter would have a new phone for the weekend! Thinking about complaining to Amazon, but really, what good would it do, probably none.

Reviews.Title: misleading
Reviews.Author: Tommy D
Reviews.Content: I have a current family plan with Verizon. I also have the LG Cosmos 3 that I got a little wet at the beach, so I wanted another new one. The phone I received only will work with pre-paid accounts , so like other have said here, if you don't want a prepaid phone, do not order this! I am returning the phone to amazon, as Verizon told me on the phone , they could not program it to my current family plan account.

Reviews.Title: Be careful - you CANNOT use this with your Verizon plan - it is prepaid only
Reviews.Author: dmajerovitz
Reviews.Content: The 'fine print' is in the very last line of the description, which I did not see. You cannot use this with your existing Verizon plan. It must be activated as a pre-paid phone ONLY. I did not open the box and sent it back, so I don't know how it works. The description should be made clear.

Reviews.Title: deceitful
Reviews.Author: Chip
Reviews.Content: I needed to purchase an LG Cosmos 3 cell phone to add and activate to our verizon friends and family plan.  When i received the LG Cosmos 3 from amazon it was a pre-paid phone and it couldn't be activated to our plan.  NOWHERE in the ad did it say it was a pre-paid phone.  Totally deceitful.  I wasted my money and time.  I will never order from amazon again.

Reviews.Title: didn't realize it was a prepaid phone.
Reviews.Author: tingen
Reviews.Content: Only at the very bottom of the small print did the description say that it was a prepaid phone.  Some of us aren't very technologically advanced and the description should be more clear.

Reviews.Title: Had to send back.
Reviews.Author: Cody
Reviews.Content: DID NOT say it was pre paid and it is. Had to send back due to it would not work on my contract line I have. Pre paid phone have to be activated for 6 months before they can be used on contract line for Verizon .

Reviews.Title: Worst phone I've ever used
Reviews.Author: Matt Barnett
Reviews.Content: I wanted to get out of the smartphone game, so I zipped my plan and went prepaid with this phone.I used it for 21 days.On day 22 I went screaming back to an iPhone. "I'll pay. I'll pay" I said as I slowly rocked back and forth on the Verizon Wireless floor. "Just get that Cosmos away from me."Poorly designed buttons ... tiny screen ... slick back so when you try and slide it open, you're at risk of the phone sailing 20 yards away. And that slide out keyboard? Bleh.Life NOT Good with the "LnG Cosmos 3."

Reviews.Title: Had to return
Reviews.Author: D. Kobayashi "Doowhite"
Reviews.Content: Sorry, had to return it because didn't realize I can't use a prepaid phone for my current plan.  Seems like a decent phone but not nearly as nice as some of the other ones I've had.  I ended up buying a used Extravert on eBay which was a better choice.  A little cheaper, although with some scratches.  But easily covered with a cheap new case and works like new so far!

Reviews.Title: got burnt
Reviews.Author: Debora A Weaver
Reviews.Content: My contract ran out of Verizon, I just wanted a plain and simple phone to use.  I didn't know I was buying a pre-paid phone until my gift was tried to be activated 400 miles away.  I have Post-paid, what a waiste of money and effort.

Reviews.Title: It was only for prepaid plans and now I'm stuck with it.  When I bought it, it didn't specify for prepaid
Reviews.Author: Mashell Sonne
Reviews.Content: It sucks because I paid 40 dollars for a phone I can't use.It would have been nice to know before

Reviews.Title: HAS TO BE PREPAID
Reviews.Author: TheCritic216
Reviews.Content: I had high hopes for this item and it turns out that it HAS to be a prepaid phone and it is impossible to use it otherwise. DO NOT ORDER FOR YOU POST ACCOUNT!

Reviews.Title: Approach with Caution
Reviews.Author: Soni Lee "Everinspired"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for the $35 prepaid Verizon plan since my LG Octane did not qualify for this plan.  Verizon set it up and it took 1 hour to get through the 6-month activation.  When it was finally set up I asked the best way to get internet access and was told that is not possible with this phone!I got home and started to set up my contacts and was truly disappointed.  Packaged, it is impossible to see that the only view you have is the small front panel, although when you slide out the keyboard it does change from portrait to landscape.  That's it.  The keys are very small and difficult if you don't have tiny coordinated hands.  The slide-out keyboard can be cumbersome to pull out and the keys are very small and close together.  My SD card from my Octane doesn't fit this phone, but more important is the way the SD card is inserted.  You have to remove the back of the phone to insert and remove!  Bottom line is the phone just feels cheaper than it is.I called Verizon to register a suggestion in regard to marketing equipment to do something they know can't be done.  Meanwhile, I am considering reactivating my Octane and going back to the $50 -- this phone just feels that badNo doubt many would like this phone and it would suit their needs.  However, if you are going for bang for your buck, not so sure this one is it.  It will challenge your patience!  I've had several LG phones and loved them all.  This one?  Not so much!  LG proved that it, too, is not perfect!

Reviews.Title: LG Cosmos 3
Reviews.Author: Angry
Reviews.Content: THE ADVERTISEMENT DID NOT SAY ANYTHING ABOUT THE PHONE BEING PRE-PAID.  I WAS TOLD THAT VERIZON COULD NOT ACTIVATE THE PHONE ON MY CURRENT PLAN AND THAT IT HAD TO BE PRE-PAID FOR 6 MONTHS.  DO NOT FALL INTO THIS SCAM.  BLAME THE CELL PROVIDER AS MUCH AS THIS HORRIBLE MARKETING SCEME.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY! FALSE PRODUCT INFO
Reviews.Author: Jason M. Peck "lantern"
Reviews.Content: YOU CANT USE THIS PHONE AS A VERIZON PHONE! I TOOK IT TO THE STORE AND WAS TOLD THAT THEY CANNOT ACTIVATE IT. IT HAS TO BE A SEPERATE PREPAID PLAN AND WILL NOT WORK AS A REPLACEMENT PHONE. THE PRODUCT DESCRIPTION DOES NOT SAY THIS AND U WILL GET BURNED!

Reviews.Title: PREPAID ONLY
Reviews.Author: Alexandria Harvey
Reviews.Content: This is only available for those who want a prepaid phone!!!! I had to return it because I had a contract and could not use this phone unless I used it as a prepaid phone for 6 months first.

Reviews.Title: walmart phone
Reviews.Author: William A.
Reviews.Content: I did not realize this was a prepaid verizon phone and can not be used on my verizon plan ! I did not read something right before buying this wall street phone , occupy box is all its good for ! I had to buy another phone else where

ProductInfo.Features:
Four-Line QWERTY Keyboard
Quick Updates to Facebook®
Mobile Web, Text, Picture, and Voice Messaging
1.3 Megapixel Camera
ProductInfo.Name: LG Cosmos 3 Prepaid Phone (Verizon Wireless)
